TopicTitle: Fanwork Friday: runners up for our Valentina Kerman contest

Articles.Content: <figure><img alt="image" src="https://31.media.tumblr.com/301cb0bc17ca76a396dc75e2651dee4d/tumblr_inline_nkfvkdJzLu1rr2wit.jpg"/></figure><p>Time to reveal the winners of our Valentina’s Day contest! The ultimate winner will be announced by Maxmaps during Squadcast (19:30 EST / 00:30 UTC tonight on <b><a href="http://www.twitch.tv/ksptv/">KSPTV</a></b>) but we’ll give you a teaser by showing you the runners up. <br/></p><p>The task of making a selection between all the entries was certainly not an easy one, it felt somewhat cruel. A massive, massive thank you to everyone who participated in the contest, we enjoyed seeing all your creations.</p><p>'So, without further ado, we present to you' the runners up of the Valentina's Day contest!</p><p><i>*drum roll*</i><br/></p><figure><img alt="image" src="https://31.media.tumblr.com/f8a2025aaab1003187cfb7b2c13bcb5d/tumblr_inline_nkfvtw1u9s1rr2wit.jpg"/></figure><p>Orbital_Phoenix’s Kerbal Space Program poster featuring Valentina in the role of bad-ass and pilot of a team or three<br/></p><figure><img alt="image" src="https://31.media.tumblr.com/10cecc1d4c406f9c462dc78bd19df763/tumblr_inline_nkfvtpl03p1rr2wit.jpg"/></figure><p>Little Katie’s depiction of Valentina Kerman holding on to the antenna of a Vostok-6 while flying over Kerbin.<br/></p>
I liked Little Katie's video, showing the picture as a WIP with entertaining and informative commentary. But I think Orbital_Phoenix's picture is a little bit better. They're both real good.
Man, that winner must be extraordinary to beat those two.
Plot twist: It's this one:
Oh my god why did I make that

They announced the winner!

Also thanks so much for making my entry runner up :D !!!! It means so much to me.

Edited February 28, 2015 by Little Katie
typing with naughty parrot on my arm

Oribtals picture is the buisness, really like that (Congrats to the winner btw!!)
